data.name: Absolution
data.note:
Execution - Requires Accusations
Requires Pistol
Costs 20% fewer action points per Accusation spent
data.description:
A precision shot to the enemy's vital organs which deals damage based on combo points. This ability ignores all armor.
1 Accusation: V physical damage.
2 Accusations: W physical damage.
3 Accusations: X physical damage.
4 Accusations: Y physical damage.
5 Accusations: Z physical damage.

data.name: Blessed Bullets of Cleansing
data.note: You can only have one set of Blessed Bullets active.
data.description: You load your pistol with bullets designed to fragment on impact, causing your executions to deal an additional X elemental damage to the target. The victim will lose 20 action points, and you will gain 20 action points.

data.name: Blessed Bullets of Confession
data.note: You can only have one set of Blessed Bullets active.
data.description: You load your pistol with bullets doused in holy water, causing your executions to deal an additional X elemental damage. Any healing abilities that the victim uses over the next 5 seconds will become 50% as effective.

data.name: Blessed Bullets of Purity
data.note: You can only have one set of Blessed Bullets active.
data.description: You load your pistol with bullets of purest silver, causing your executions to deal an additional X elemental damage.  The victims take a (2 * rank) ability penalty to initiative for 10 seconds. You gain the same amount of initiative during this time.

data.name: Blood, Faith, And Fire
data.description: Your executions have a 20% chance per accusation spent to grant 40 action points to all groupmates within 30 feet.

data.name: Broad Swings
data.description: All of your attacks for the next 10 seconds will strike up to 2 additional enemies within 25 feet in front of you.

data.name: Brute Force
data.description: Gain a 160 unique bonus to strength.

data.name: Burn Armor
data.description: A surprise attack that burns your enemies within 30 feet, causing them to take X physical damage. Your abilities will cost 50% fewer Action Points for 10 seconds.

data.name: Burn Away Lies
data.note:
Execution - Requires Accusations
Target must be facing away from you
Costs 20% fewer action points per Accusation spent
data.description:
A pistol shot that fires bullets filled with fire oil, first dealing damage over 9 seconds and then igniting into a raging inferno which deals additional damage.
1 Accusation: A physical damage over time; B ending damage.
2 Accusations: C physical damage over time; D ending damage.
3 Accusations: E physical damage over time; F ending damage.
4 Accusations: G physical damage over time; H physical ending damage.
5 Accusations: I physical damage over time; J ending damage.

data.name: Burn, Heretic!
data.note:
Execution - Requires Accusations
Requires Pistol
Costs 20% fewer action points per Accusation spent
data.description:
A cleansing shot of flame which deals damage to your target over 10 seconds.
1 Accusation: V physical damage
2 Accusations: W physical damage
3 Accusations: X physical damage
4 Accusations: Y physical damage
5 Accusations: Z physical damage

data.name: Confess!
data.description: A savage counterattack that deals X physical damage and disarms your target for 4 seconds, making them unable to use their weapons.

data.name: Confusing Movements
data.description: Concentrating on your perceived movements, you will be able to dodge and parry all attacks against you for 7 seconds.

data.name: Declare Anathema
data.note: You cannot perform this action while rooted
data.description: You leap backwards from your target, causing your target to be staggered for up to 3 seconds, preventing all actions unless they're damaged.

data.name: Divine Blast
data.description: Deals 1600 damage to all enemies in front of you, up to 65 feet away.

data.name: Dragon Gun
data.note:
Execution - Requires Accusations
Requires Pistol
Costs 20% fewer action points per Accusation spent
data.description:
A pistol shot that deals damage to your target and all other enemies near them.
1 Accusation: V elemental damage, 30 feet radius
2 Accusations: W elemental damage, 35 feet radius
3 Accusations: X elemental damage, 40 feet radius
4 Accusations: Y elemental damage, 43.3 feet radius
5 Accusations: Z elemental damage, 48.3 feet radius

data.name: Emperor's Ward
data.description:
Any time you are attacked, there is a 25% chance that you will become protected by a magical barrier for up to 10 seconds, which will absorb up to 375 damage.
This effect will not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.

data.name: Encourage Confession
data.description: Blessed Bullets will now also make the target 5% easier to critical hit for 6 seconds.

data.name: Excommunicate
data.description: For the next 15 seconds, heals will have no effects on your target. The target and all other enemies within 20 feet of them will suffer 1200 damage over 15 seconds.

data.name: Exit Wound
data.note:
Execution - Requires Accusations
Requires Pistol
Costs 20% fewer action points per Accusation spent
data.description:
You fire a hollow point shell, dealing damage immediately and causing the target to take an ability penalty to toughness, strength, and weapon skill for 10 seconds.
1 Accusation: V physical damage; stats reduced by 50.
2 Accusations: W physical damage; stats reduced by 75.
3 Accusations: X physical damage; stats reduced by 100.
4 Accusations: Y physical damage; stats reduced by 125.
5 Accusations: Z physical damage; stats reduced by 150.

data.name: Exoneration
data.description: You regain 1197 health and 180 action points over 9 seconds.

data.name: Expurgation
data.description: Deals 1600 damage over 10 seconds to all enemies within 30 feet and snares them, reducing their run speed by 60%.

data.name: Fanatical Cleansing
data.description: Your critical hits will inflict 50% more damage.

data.name: Fanatical Zeal
data.description: You leap from the shadows, fueled with righteous anger. Your target will take X physical damage. Your abilities will cost 50% fewer action points for 10 seconds.

data.name: Feinted Positioning
data.description: Your positional attacks can be used without the positional requirement for 10 seconds. Does not affect morale abilities.

data.name: Fervor
data.description: A precise incision that deals X physical damage, and an additional Y physical damage over 9 seconds. This effect can be stacked up to 3 times.

data.name: Flanking
data.description: All of your attacks deal 15% more damage when you strike an enemy from the sides or rear.

data.name: Flee
data.description:
You run away from the battle in a mad panic, increasing your run speed by 30% for 10 seconds. You immediately lose all of your action points, any career mechanic points, and your morale will begin to drop, and you will not begin to regain action points until 10 seconds have passed.

You can use this ability again to cancel the effect early, but you will still remain panicked and will not regain action points for the full duration.

data.name: Flowing Accusations
data.description: All of your executions restore 2 Accusations. This effect can only happen once every 10 seconds.

data.name: Force of Will
data.description: You stare down your opponent, draining 200 of their action points into yourself, and target takes a 160 morale penalty to strength for 30 seconds.

data.name: Frenzied Slaughter
data.description: All of your abilities will cost 25% fewer action points, cool down 50% faster, and deal 20% more damage for 7 seconds.

data.name: Get Thee Behind Me!
data.description:
Detaunts all enemies within 30 feet, making them hate you less and causing them to deal only 50% damage to you for 15 seconds.
If you hit anyone that you have detaunted, the effect will end.

data.name: Incognito
data.description: You begin quietly hunting for heretics, making it less likely that hostile monsters will notice you but slowly draining away your action points. This effect will end if you use any abilities, run out of action points, or after 30 seconds has passed.

data.name: Inquisitor's Fury
data.description: Each time you critically hit an enemy, your autoattack speed will be increased by 50% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Jagged Edge
data.description: Any time you critically hit an enemy they will begin to bleed, suffering additional 606 corporeal damage over 9 seconds.

data.name: Last Rites
data.description: Any time you land a killing blow on an enemy, you will regain 576 health over 9 seconds.

data.name: Penetrating Barbs
data.description: Increases the durations of Fanatical Zeal, Burn Armor, and Sudden Accusation by an additional 5 seconds.

data.name: Pick Lock
data.description: You bolster yourself for 10 seconds, allowing you to bypass the defenses of an enemy keep's postern door, porting you inside.

data.name: Pistol Whip
data.note:
Requires Pistol
Builds 1 Accusation
Target must be facing away from you
data.description: A quick backhand blow with the butt of your pistol that knocks your target down for 3 seconds.

data.name: No One Expects The Inquisition
data.description: Burn Armor, Sudden Accusation, and Fanatical Zeal now build 3 accusations. In addition, all attacks that build accusations have a 50% chance to build an additional accusation.

data.name: Protection from Heresy
data.description: When leaving Incognito, you will become protected by a barrier that will absorb up to X damage

data.name: Punish The False
data.description: A precision blow that deals X physical damage, and causes a lingering wound which reduces the effectiveness of all healing by 50% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Razor Strike
data.description: A quick precision strike that deals X physical damage to enemies 25 feet in front of you.

data.name: Relentless Assault
data.description: A prolonged fervor that grants 10 action points a second to everyone in your group within 100 feet of you for 10 seconds.

data.name: Repel Blasphemy
data.description: A melee attack that deals X physical damage. Your chance to parry attacks is increased by 100% for the next 5 seconds.

data.name: Reversal of Fortune
data.description: You turn your enemy's luck against them, dealing 1200 damage to all targets in line in front of you, up to 65 feet away from you.

data.name: Righteous Steel
data.description: Increases your chance to parry attacks by 10%. You have a 25% chance each time you parry to build 1 accusation. This effect can only happen once every 3 seconds.

data.name: Riposte
data.description: Each time you parry an enemy's attack, you will strike them back for X physical damage which they can not prevent.

data.name: Sanctified Bullets
data.description: Blessed Bullets will now heal you for 100% of the damage that they cause.

data.name: Seal of Destruction
data.description: A holy relic created under the tutelage of Elven mages, the Seal allows your attacks to ignore 50% the victim's armor for the next 7 seconds.

data.name: Seeker's Blade
data.description: A melee attack that can not be defended against, and deals X physical damage. If the target is ailing, then they will also become cursed for 15 seconds, reducing their chances to block, parry, dodge, and disrupt attacks by 5%.

data.name: Seeker's Triumph
data.description: Seeker's Blade will now ignore 50% of the target's armor, and its cooldown time is reduced by 5 seconds.

data.name: Sever Blessing
data.description: You sever one blessing from your enemy and do X physical damage

data.name: Sever Nerve
data.description: A directed strike that inflicts 1200 damage to your target.

data.name: Shroud of Magnus
data.description:
Rumored to be the death shroud of Magnus the Pious, this holy relic increases your chance to disrupt enemy magic by 100% for 7 seconds.
You may only use a single relic at a time.

data.name: Sigil of Sigmar
data.description: An artifact of the Temple of Sigmar which removes all roots and snares from you. For the next 10 seconds, roots and snares will have no effect on you.

data.name: Sigmar's Favor
data.description: Any time that you are healed by a direct heal, there is a 25% chance that you will regain an additional 135 hit points as well.

data.name: Silence, Heretic!
data.description: A punishing blow that silences your target, making them unable to use magic for 3 seconds. If you are behind your target, then you will also deal X physical damage.

data.name: Snap Shot
data.description:
A quick pistol shot that deals X physical damage, and can be used on the run.
Your attack will snare the enemy if used behind your target, reducing their run speed by 40% for 5 seconds.

data.name: Sudden Accusation
data.description: You leap from the shadows and accuse your target of heresy. Your target will take X elemental damage over 15 seconds that builds over time. Your abilities will cost 50% fewer Action Points for 10 seconds.

data.name: Sweeping Razor
data.description: Razor Strike, Sanctified Oil (PH), and Van Horstman's Speculum now deal elemental damage.

data.name: Torment
data.description: A destructive thrust that deals X physical damage to your enemy. If you are behind your target, this attack will ignore X armor.

data.name: Trial By Pain
data.note:
Execution - Requires Accusations
Requires Pistol
Costs 20% fewer action points per Accusation spent
data.description:
A barrage of withering fire that damages your targetX20f and enemies within 20 feet for up to 3 seconds, as long as you maintain your concentration.
1 Accusation: V physical damage per shot
2 Accusations: W physical damage per shot.
3 Accusations: X physical damage per shot
4 Accusations: Y physical damage per shot
5 Accusations: Z physical damage per shot

data.name: Unwavering Faith
data.description: Gain a 252 unique bonus to spirit resistance.

data.name: Van Horstmann's Speculum
data.description: A tiny enchanted mirror hung around your neck, this holy relic deals X physical damage to anyone that strikes you with a melee attack over the next 7 seconds. This effect will hit enemies within 20ft of the attacking enemy and has a 2s cooldown per target attacking you.

data.name: Vindication
data.description: Each time you disrupt an enemy's spell, you will deal 35% more damage for 10 seconds.

data.name: Vitriolic Judgement
data.description: Whenever you kill an enemy, the cooldown on incognito is reset. This effect can only happen once every 30 seconds

data.name: Witchfinder's Protection
data.description: Everyone in your group within 100 feet of you has a 50% increased chance to parry attacks for 10 seconds.

data.name: Sanctified Oil (PH)
data.description: You light a flask of holy oil on fire to burn heretics within 30 feet of you. Enemies will take X physical damage and are interupted. This effect will continue every 2 seconds for 6 seconds.

data.name: Close Combat
data.description: Any time you strike an enemy in melee with a direct attack, you will recieve 25% less damage from ranged or magical attacks for 2 seconds. This effect will not stack with damage reductions from abilities.
